go_data.justification: VAMP2 is part of the SNARE complex and its variants affect the assembly and stability of the complex.
VAMP2 is involved in vesicle fusion, and its variants affect the rate and extent of fusion.
VAMP2 is involved in neurotransmitter release, and its variants can impair this process.
VAMP2 is a membrane protein involved in vesicle fusion and neurotransmitter release.
VAMP2 is part of the synaptic vesicle membrane and plays a role in neurotransmitter release.
